name: Fantastic Feasts
description:
Fantastic Feasts is a game I made in 5 days for the JTA Game Jam #8. It's about helping animals collect their food. The theme "start small" is interpreted quite literally as the animals grow when they get fed. I also used a lot of directional sound with the objects of the game.

I had a lot of fun making this game and I am quite proud of what I was able to accomplish. All of the code and art was made by me in the last 5 days but none of the sounds belong to me.
Thank You for stopping by and trying my little game :)
